title: fps view controller does not work in Gazebo 1.9.5

content.raw: <view_controller>fps</view_controller> worked correctly until I upgraded to Gazebo 1.9.5 (Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, ROS Hydro). Rotation with the left mouse button works, but forward-reverse translation with the scroll wheel now seems to move the camera along the world's x axis. Left-right translation with the right mouse button seems to move the camera along the world's y axis.
